title: 01/26/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 01/26/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Aaron Rodgers has everything he wants in Green Bay. Why would he want out?

-LeBron can channel criticism the way MJ and Brady can

-If you cut Tom Brady's career in half he'd be the two greatest QBs ever

-If the Patriots draft Mac Jones he will be a bust


Guests: Tom House, Tom Brady's throwing coach & former MLB Pitcher

Mike Silver, NFL Network


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
